source.f5216751:
# retrieving all file paths 
pathname = "../input/learnplatform-covid19-impact-on-digital-learning/engagement_data"
all_paths = glob.glob(pathname + "/*.csv")

for path in all_paths:
    df = pd.read_csv(path, index_col=False)
    
# adding district_id column from path
    df["district_id"] = path.split("/")[4].split(".")[0]
    
    
engagement_df = df.reset_index(drop=True)
